reviews.text: Just stayed one night in Azimut Hotel during a business trip.
reviews.title: Centrally located, huge and stylish rooms. A gem!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It's a new, quite stylish hotel in a refurbished 1950's or so office building. The room was one of the biggest I ever stayed in (35 sqm?). All was very clean and nice. I did not have breakfast (not inluded in my rate), but the bar and restaurant in the 1st floor looked nice, too.
reviews.title: Very stylish, modern, clean and spacious

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was helpful, Internet in the room is free (though you still need an access code, so it didn't work with my iPass access at the company laptop).
reviews.title: Definitely going back - this hotel is fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Even the Minibar in the room is really affordable - 2 EUR for a beer, 1.75 for snacks. First time I did not felt ripped off at a Minibar!
reviews.title: A little different!

reviews.text: Big room and good location. It was extremely expensive though (but so are all the hotels in Cologne during international fairs). It could have offered breakfast at these rated.
reviews.title: Very comfortable hotel.

reviews.text: We were compensated by free coffee, water and fruit at the lobby, all around the clock.
reviews.title: Modern, huge rooms, great price

reviews.text: We stayed here one night on our way back to the Netherlands with two babies. The rooms are huge, absolutely huge, for a standard double room. Two large single beds, a lounge area, TV, plenty of storage space, large hallway, reasonably priced mini bar, large bathroom with double sink. We were able to put the two year old in the hallway near the door in her portacot away from us watching TV. We did not have breakfast as it was 17 euros. There is a bakery across the road. It is a ten minute walk into the centre of Cologne.
reviews.title: Fantastic experience, great value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very modern and clean with efficient, friendly service. There is secure parking around the corner with direct access to the hotel for 15 euros per day.
reviews.title: A 4-star hotel for the price of a 2-star

reviews.text: If you are after a short stay in Cologne, I cannot recommend this hotel highly enough. We paid 99 euros booking the day before so could have gotten cheaper but were very pleased.
reviews.title: Excelent Hotel

reviews.text: Just returned from several nights in Cologne. Stayed at Azimut Hotel. Terribly impressed with all aspects. Room size-excellent, bathroom-excellent, furnishings-excellent and comfortable, cleanliness-excellent, SERVICE-SUPERIOR. Front desk personnel went well beyond normal expectations with service.
reviews.title: Well worth a visit

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This facility is well situated within walking distance of the DOM; the main train station and has an underground connection, just out the front door.
reviews.title: hidden gem, but area not so nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I highly recommend Azimut Hotel/Cologne. You will not regret your choice.
reviews.title: Very good value for money
Excellent value
reviews.text: Booked it for 1 night stay for 80 EUR a night with breakfast.
It seems to be a new hotel (not all taxi drivers recognized it), very good for its price.
reviews.title: Amazing Value for Money

likes.liked: — Value for Money; Staff helpfulness; Size and comfort of Room; breakfast
likes.disliked: — TV with only one English channel
